originalText.text: Overall great experience! Gil is super nice and easy to work with. I couldn't believe how fast he got the job done. I definitely recommend AAA Translations to anyone in need of translation services.

text.text: Overall great experience! Gil is super nice and easy to work with. I couldn't believe how fast he got the job done. I definitely recommend AAA Translations to anyone in need of translation services.

originalText.text: As a paralegal, I require proper and accurate translations from my clients documents. I refer all of my clients to AAA Translations Co.  The translations are professionally done, they are clear and concise as well as done in a timely manner. No one does it better than AAA Translations Co.

text.text: As a paralegal, I require proper and accurate translations from my clients documents. I refer all of my clients to AAA Translations Co.  The translations are professionally done, they are clear and concise as well as done in a timely manner. No one does it better than AAA Translations Co.

originalText.text: Super prompt with their responses, very helpful and reasonable pricing. Highly recommend!

text.text: Super prompt with their responses, very helpful and reasonable pricing. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: True professionals and experts! Highly recommend AAA Translations for quick, efficient, and reliable service. Gil was straight forward and a pleasure to work with. He told me exactly what he needs and even though I made a mistake after he sent me the document, he corrected it and didn't make an issue. I truly appreciate his dedication to the job. He is truly superman! Thank you again!

text.text: True professionals and experts! Highly recommend AAA Translations for quick, efficient, and reliable service. Gil was straight forward and a pleasure to work with. He told me exactly what he needs and even though I made a mistake after he sent me the document, he corrected it and didn't make an issue. I truly appreciate his dedication to the job. He is truly superman! Thank you again!

originalText.text:
Gil did an absolutely fantastic urgent job, with a very fast turnaround, late in the evening. He provided an official translation of a legal document which was duly accepted by the New York Passport Agency.
I highly recommend his services and will use him in the future
